title: cmd/ld: windows 32bit dll call failed
body:
by **flhshark**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

I call a dll use cgo, it works with go src version 18480 (7698a56314ed) , which same as
go1.2rc5 (I compiled it from src)
when I change to precompiled go, the exe exited immediately without any error message.
precompiled go downloaded from
https://code.google.com/p/go/downloads/detail?name=go1.2rc5.windows-386.zip&;can=1&q=

this problem also happend in go1.2 release version.

What is the expected output?
can run as self compiled go tool's output.

What do you see instead?
can't run. exited immediately without any error message.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
windows7

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
1.2rc5, 1.2

Please provide any additional information below.
